content.raw:
Nate, whats the prospect of adding synchronisation of the stereo cameras in the sensor head?

We worked on this before Christmas and a MultiCamera exists in gazebo trunk but not in the release version paired with drcsim.

Also its currently not listed in the roadmaps:
http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Roadmap

This is an essential component for sensing!
content.html:
Nate, whats the prospect of adding synchronisation of the stereo cameras in the sensor head?

We worked on this before Christmas and a MultiCamera exists in gazebo trunk but not in the release version paired with drcsim.

Also its currently not listed in the roadmaps: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Roadmap

This is an essential component for sensing!
